short_definition: (Latin) I will no further prosecute. A formal entry on the record of a case by the prosecuting attorney that the charge is dismissed; however, the charge may be reinstated at a later time.
long_definition_html: (Latin) I will no further prosecute. A formal entry on the record of a case by the prosecuting attorney that the charge is dismissed; however, the charge may be reinstated at a later time.
